services.title: Services Pricing
services.subtitle: I'm currently taking on freelance web development work.
services.currentStatus: You are welcome to contact me for a custom quote for your project. I also offer development service packages with fixed pricing.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: You can use this section to address any queries.

dataset.title: Can you reduce your product price?
dataset.description: Yes, it depends on the package selected.

dataset.title: Is the delivery time exactly mentioned on your gig?
dataset.description: Well, the delivery time will be less then mentioned ðŸ¥³.

dataset.title: Will you do modification after completing the project?
dataset.description: Yes, even after completing the project I will do changes according to the requirement and plan of your choice.

dataset.title: Can you do modification on an already developed website?
dataset.description: Yes, I dont mind doing modifications on already developed sites.

dataset.title: Will you build my site on Wordpress?
dataset.description: No, I will design your website on custom code which will be easy to understand and can be modifiable by other developers.

dataset.title: Will I be able to change your design?
dataset.description: Yes, it will be easy to change for other developers.
